Question & Options:
In the 2017 movie 'The Emoji Movie', what was the initial idea that director Tony Leondis considered for the emojis?
Options:
A. Emojis visiting the real world
B. Emojis creating their own universe
C. Emojis fighting against other apps
D. Emojis discovering new emotions

In the 2017 film 'The Emoji Movie', which classic animated film inspired director Tony Leondis in the development of the story?
Options:
A. Finding Nemo (2003)
B. Toy Story (1995)
C. Shrek (2001)
D. The Lion King (1994)

In the movie 'The Emoji Movie' (2017), what event raised concerns about the movie becoming outdated due to the evolution of phone technology?
Options:
A. The release of new emojis
B. The announcement of Miller as the lead on World Emoji Day
C. The introduction of a new smartphone
D. The launch of a competing animated film
Correct Answer: The announcement of Miller as the lead on World Emoji Day
